sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: establish the link and end.
so far we haven't gotten a link FROM armis, so we can establish a new link

sys_variable_value.value: we have at least one MAC in the linking cache

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If there are no matching cross-reference records, we need to attempt to link to an existing Armis record, then push one if there isn't one already.

sys_variable_value.value: we need to create a cross-reference link

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: queries Armis multiple times with this device's MACs to attempt to find a record, creates a Armis Computer Data table entry if successful

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Check the macs we just evaluated, sort by weight

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: We don't need to link, we already have a link
we failed to link, so we're done.
